name: Fate Forever (Open-Source Godot Shooter)
description:
What if Doom was a top-down shooter?
   This game was born from  a fun idea of making Doom Eternal as a top-down
shooter... But I had no time to work on something big so I made this simple project in a few days. The name is a parody of Doom Eternal.

Anything special?

Not really. Just made with a lot of love :)

Open-Source (MIT License) game made in Godot Engine!

Please give your feedback and ideas!
